Text.val: 07.02.2013 JH SCR17938 Changed attributes in the forms from Alpha to Unicode
25.07.2011 SH SCR16634 Removed test CDOV_CLIENTCHARGED = Y
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Only perform this test if MONTH(V.DATE) = 1,2,4,5,7,8,10,11
-- Get user language, used to switch back to user language if report was produce
report has to be printed in HOFF_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Only perform this test if MONTH(V.DATE) = 1,2,4,5,7,8,10,11

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT203_OFFICE, CLNT208_HGROUP from :1/CLNT where (CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ=1 and exists (select * from :1/CDOV where CLNT101_ADMNO=CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO=CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CDOV_TEXT is not null and CDOV_JOURNALNOCOV=0 and CDOV_DATE between ':2' and ':4') or CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ=3 and exists (select * from :1/CDOV where CLNT101_ADMNO=CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO=CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CDOV_TEXT is not null and CDOV_JOURNALNOCOV=0 and CDOV_DATE between ':3' and ':4')) and :5 group by CLNT203_OFFICE, CLNT208_HGROUP order by CLNT203_OFFICE, CLNT208_HGROUP for fetch only

Text.val: -- Report has to be printed in office language
-- Textfields which used in BXA440C for the heading lines
.. set filename for temporary XML Files
-- set final filename for the XML File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- At client level one line with all details
-- At date level lines without client details, first row is already written on
.. extract 35 character strings from CDOV_TEXT, until all characters are written
-- Reset variables within the block loop to achieve writing of additional
text lines without repeating the detail information
